entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
